title: IPL Auction
description: Participants use a dataset built by the organizer, which may not be related to real-time data, to strategically build their dream cricket team. With a budget in hand, they must efficiently bid for players, aiming to create a balanced team of 11 players, including batsmen, bowlers, and all-rounders in the correct ratio. Judging criteria include the efficiency of player purchases and the overall team composition.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
The team-head should register for the event on behalf of the team.
rules: Each team must consist of 3 to 4 members.
Every team will receive a predefined budget to build their squad.
The dataset for players will be provided by the organizers.
Teams must bid for players strategically within their budget.
Each team must have a total of 11 players, with a balanced composition of batsmen, bowlers, and all-rounders.
Judging will be based on budget management, player selection efficiency, and team balance.
Use of external resources or gadgets for data analysis is not allowed.
